goal.ch: Introduce statistics in the context of contemporary business. Emphasizing statistical literacy in thinking and how to apply its concepts with real data and examples to develop a deeper conceptual understanding.
goal.en: Introduce statistics in the context of contemporary business. Emphasizing statistical literacy in thinking and how to apply its concepts with real data and examples to develop a deeper conceptual understanding.

outline.ch:

Midterm Exam

Sampling Distributions (Chapter 5)
